cooked: Oh, and I forgot to mention on the subject of vaults/presigned-txns: I’ve spoken to two Blockstream engineers in the past couple months who both say that CTV could be used to drastically improve the Liquid timelock-fallback script that requires coins to be rolled on a periodic basis. This may apply to Liana as well.
